meaningMnemonic: In the <radical>dirt</radical>, you find a <radical>lid</radical> under the <radical>table</radical>. You lift it to reveal a deep <kanji>pit</kanji>. Why is there a <kanji>hole</kanji> under your table?
readingMnemonic: When you reach the bottom of the <kanji>pit</kanji>, you hear someone scuffling around and the sounds of chains. You light a match and inch closer to see what it is. In the darkness, you see <reading>こう</reading>いち, starved and chained in a pit under your table.
